headline: How Stronger West African Cocoa Harvest And Dividend News At Mondelez (MDLZ) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Earlier this month, Mondelez International’s board declared a regular quarterly dividend of US$0.50 per Class A share, payable on January 14, 2026, to shareholders on record as of December 31, 2025. At the same time, the company highlighted a significantly stronger cocoa pod count in West Africa, hinting at easing input cost pressures for its chocolate portfolio. We’ll now explore how the improved cocoa supply outlook may influence Mondelez’s investment narrative, particularly its margin and...
